    • Method Detail

      • isWhiteList

        public boolean isWhiteList()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the registry entry ids represents a set of 'white listed' entries. Default is false.

      • setWhiteList

        public void setWhiteList(boolean whiteList)
        Sets the whether or not the registry entry ids list is a 'white list' or not.
        Parameters:
        whiteList - boolean value for whiteList

      • getRegistryEntryIds

        public Set<String> getRegistryEntryIds()
        Get a string set of the federation service ids allowed to be queried
        Returns:
        A set of registry entry id strings

      • setRegistryEntryIds

        public void setRegistryEntryIds(Set<String> registryEntryIds)
        Setter for the list of allowed federation service ids. All registry ids in this list will be allowed to be queried and returned
        Parameters:
        registryEntryIds - Set of registry entry ids

      • processPreCreate

        public PolicyResponse processPreCreate(Metacard input,
                                       Map<String,Serializable> properties)
                                throws StopProcessingException
        Description copied from interface: PolicyPlugin
        Processes a Metacard, prior to ddf.catalog.source.CatalogProvider#create(ddf.catalog.operation.CreateRequest), to return policy information
        Specified by:
        processPreCreate in interface PolicyPlugin
        Parameters:
        input - the Metacard to process
        properties - the request properties
        Returns:
        policy information to pass to the AccessPlugin
        Throws:
        StopProcessingException - thrown to halt processing when a critical issue occurs during processing. This is intended to prevent other plugins from processing as well.
